content: aiden e pose aka baby fat use whatever weight yarn and appropriate sized hook you choose 4 ply/worsted weight will result in 6 7 tall whereas #10 cotton will be 1 5 2 tall additional items safety eyes & embroidery floss body working in rounds round 1 7 single_crochet in magic_ring 7 round 2 2sc in each single_crochet around 14 round 3 single_crochet in next single_crochet 2sc in next single_crochet repeat around 21 round 4 single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet 2sc in next single_crochet repeat around 28 round 5 single_crochet in next 3 single_crochet 2sc in next single_crochet repeat around 35 round 6 single_crochet in nest 4 single_crochet 2sc in next single_crochet repeat around 42 round 7 15 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 42 round 16 single_crochet in the next 6 single_crochet 2sc in the next single_crochet repeat around 48 round 17 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 48 round 18 *2sc in next single_crochet single_crochet in next 3 single_crochet repeat from * four more times 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet single_crochet in each rem single_crochet 54 round 19 25 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 54 round 26 single_crochet in the next 27 single_crochet * 2sc in the next single_crochet single_crochet in the next 8 single_crochet repeat from * two more times 2 single_crochet in the next single_crochet 58 round 27 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 58 round 28 single_crochet in next single_crochet * decrease single_crochet in next 3 single_crochet repeat from * around 46 round 29 decrease single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet repeat around 34 round 30 decrease single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet repeat around 25 this is a good place to add the eyes and stuffing round 31 * decrease single_crochet in next single_crochet repeat from * seven more times single_crochet in last single_crochet 17 round 32 * decrease repeat from * seven more times single_crochet in the last single_crochet finish off leaving a long tail 9 weave tail through stitches of last round and pull to close opening weave in end arms working in rounds make 2 round 1 chain 4 in magic_ring 4 round 2 2sc in each single_crochet 8 round 3 single_crochet in next single_crochet 2sc in next single_crochet repeat around 12 round 4 single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet 2sc in next single_crochet repeat around 16 round 5 7 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 16 round 8 decrease single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet repeat around 12 round 9 11 single_crochet in each single_crochet around finish off leaving a long tail 12 flatten arm or lightly stuff and sew to body see picture for placement feet not worked in rounds worked from the bottom/sole upwards make 2 round 1 chain 5 round 2 3sc in 2nd chain from the hook single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet 3sc in last chain working back along the opposite side of the chain single_crochet in the next 2 single_crochet slip st to the first single_crochet 10 round 3 chain 1 2 single_crochet in the same st 2sc in the next 2 single_crochet
